title: R.I.P Rangers Trailblazer 2015-2015
body:
My favorite jungle item out of the four and you took it from me. :(

Its in a better place now.

replies.body: thank fuck that item is gone, it was complete bullshit when u play zac and they smite all 4 of your passive blobs and instakill you
da fuq? 4 smites? Btw rangers trailblazer was the purple item... It didn't have an active. Mainly used to farm jungle and tears of Vi's enemies
its an aoe smite so it could smite all 4 of zacs passive blobs
In other news: these masteries help a fcktonne in jg.. Spell vamp AND life vamp.. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
